name: Server Room E
locked_message: The thick metal door to the server room holds fast, with a red circular badge reader next to it.  You'll need a badge with higher privileges than your own to get in.
unlocked_after_key_message: You place the new badge against the reader, and with a few beeps and a flash of green, the server room door slowly swings open...
unlocked_message: You place your master access badge against the reader, and the door slowly swings open...
